name: Flashback Mini Delay
details:
Mini delayUltra-compact delay pedal with built-in TonePrint technology gives you legendary TC Electronic delay sounds in a tiny form factor
TonePrint-enabled to let you beam cool signature tones into your pedal with the free TonePrint App
Design your own customized delay effects from scratch with free TonePrint Editor for PC, Mac*, and iPad*
Audio Tapping feature allows you to set delay tempo by strumming your guitar
7 seconds of delay time allows everything from vintage slapback to cavernous echoes
True bypass allows for optimum clarity and zero high-end loss when the pedal is off
Analog-Dry-Through maintains total integrity of analog dry signal path even when delay effect is engaged
Works flawlessly with guitar and FX loop signals
Extra-small enclosure easily fits on any pedal board
3-Year Warranty Program*
Designed and engineered in Denmark
http://www.tcelectronic.com/flashback-mini-delay/
